title: Patch Notes
content: City - clothes fit for humans. Without tail holes. Updated several boots that were making githyanki knees disappear when equipped. Updated the Teal Slimfit Outfit to correctly show a tiefling body instead of a human body when equipped by tieflings. The colors of the Strapped Choker Leather Ensemble should now display correctly after you switch from a visual with the same mesh but different colours.
